questions.question_sk: Určte pravdivosť výrokov: V1: Existuje prvočíslo deliteľné 8. V2: Všetky prvočísla sú nepárne. V3: Existuje celé číslo, ktoré nie je racionálne. V4: Existuje iracionálne číslo ako podiel prirodzených čísel. V5: Každé nepárne číslo je tvaru $2x+1$, $x\in\mathbb{Z}$.

questions.question_sk: Riešenia rovnice $\tan x = \cot x$
questions.question_en: Solutions to the equation $\tan x = \cot x$

questions.question_sk: Ktoré z nasledujúcich tvrdení o kvadratickej rovnici $x^2 - 4x + 4 = 0$ sú pravdivé?
questions.question_en: Which of the following statements about the quadratic equation $x^2 - 4x + 4 = 0$ are true?
options_sk: Rovnica má dva rovnaké reálne korene.
options_en: The equation has exactly one solution.
The equation has two identical real roots.
The product of the roots of the equation is 4.
The sum of the roots of the equation is -4.
The equation has no real solutions.

questions.question_sk: Ktoré z nasledujúcich vlastností platia pre funkciu $f(x) = \sin x + \cos x$ na intervale $[0, 2\pi]$?
questions.question_en: Which of the following properties hold for the function $f(x) = \sin x + \cos x$ on the interval $[0, 2\pi]$?
options_en: The function has a maximum at $x = \frac{\pi}{4}$.
The function has a minimum at $x = \frac{5\pi}{4}$.
The function has a zero at $x = \frac{3\pi}{4}$.
The function is periodic with period $\pi$.

questions.question_sk: Ktoré z nasledujúcich čísel patria do množiny prirodzených čísel deliteľných 6, ale nie 9?
questions.question_en: Which of the following numbers belong to the set of natural numbers divisible by 6 but not by 9?

questions.question_sk: Ktoré z nasledujúcich tvrdení o geometrickej postupnosti s prvým členom $a_1 = 2$ a kvocientom $q = 3$ sú pravdivé?
questions.question_en: Which of the following statements about the geometric sequence with first term $a_1 = 2$ and ratio $q = 3$ are true?
options_en: The second term of the sequence is 6.
The third term of the sequence is 18.
The sum of the first three terms is 26.
The fourth term of the sequence is 54.

questions.question_sk: Ktoré z nasledujúcich tvrdení o rovnici $|x - 1| = 3$ sú pravdivé?
questions.question_en: Which of the following statements about the equation $|x - 1| = 3$ are true?
options_en: The equation has two real roots.
The solutions of the equation are $x = -2$ and $x = 4$.
The sum of the roots of the equation is 2.
The product of the roots of the equation is -8.
